dcterms:description: A novel dataset of authentic guest reviews sourced from a prominent online travel platform, containing over two million reviews from 50,000 distinct accommodations, including contextual details about the guest and the accommodation.
dcterms:title: User-generated reviews dataset

dcterms:creator: Fengjun Wang
Moran Beladev
Ofri Kleinfeld
Elina Frayerman
Tal Shachar
Eran Fainman
Karen Lastmann Assaraf
Sarai Mizrachi
Benjamin Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset used for multi-label text classification to efficiently detect topics in user-generated content, particularly in the context of travel.
dcterms:title: Text2topic model dataset

dcterms:creator: Julian McAuley
Christopher Targett
Qinfeng Shi
Anton van den Hengel
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 82.8 million reviews across 24 domains, used for image-based recommendations and analysis of product reviews.
dcterms:title: Amazon Product Reviews dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 515k reviews crawled from Booking.com, referenced in the context of existing datasets in the travel domain.
dcterms:title: Booking.com crawled dataset

dcterms:creator: Bin Fang
Qiang Ye
Deniz Kucukusta
Rob Law
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 41k reviews for attractions in New Orleans, used to analyze the perceived helpfulness of online tourism reviews.
dcterms:title: TripAdvisor dataset

dcterms:creator: Konstantinos Tsamis
Andreas Komninos
Konstantinos Kovas
Nikolaos Zotos
dcterms:description: A dataset of 65k English hotel reviews from TripAdvisor, used for ranking online user reviews based on usefulness.
dcterms:title: Dataset from Tsamis et al. (2021)
